dcterms:creator: S. Wan
C. Gong
P. Zhong
B. Du
L. Zhang
J. Yang
dcterms:description: The Indian Pines dataset was collected in northwestern India, in 1992. This dataset consists of 145 × 145 pixels with a spatial resolution of 20 m. There are 200 spectral bands remaining after removing 20 water absorption and noisy spectral bands. The dataset includes 16 land cover categories.
dcterms:title: Indian Pines

dcterms:creator: S. Wan
C. Gong
P. Zhong
S. Pan
G. Li
J. Yang
dcterms:description: The University of Pavia dataset was captured by the ROSIS sensor in Pavia University, Italy. This dataset consists of 610 × 340 pixels with a spatial resolution of 1.3 m. After removing noisy spectral bands, there are 103 spectral bands remaining. The dataset includes 9 land cover categories.
dcterms:title: University of Pavia

dcterms:creator: S. Wan
S. Pan
P. Zhong
X. Chang
J. Yang
C. Gong
dcterms:description: The Salinas dataset was collected by the AVIRIS sensor in Salinas Valley, CA, USA. This dataset comprises 512 × 217 pixels with a spatial resolution of 3.7 m. After removing 20 water absorption spectral bands, there are 204 remaining spectral bands. The dataset includes 16 land cover categories.
dcterms:title: Salinas

dcterms:creator: L. Mou
X. Lu
X. Li
X. X. Zhu
dcterms:description: The Houston University dataset covers the Houston University campus and its neighboring areas. This dataset contains 349 × 1905 pixels with a spatial resolution of 2.5 m. There are 144 spectral bands ranging from 380 to 1050 nm. The dataset includes 15 land cover categories.
dcterms:title: Houston University
